attributes.action: Changes to the present adoption of childre law
attributes.additional_details:
Having seen the report on BBC1 on social services today 13/01/14 it has shown that the law on adoption of children to be totally wrong and out of date especially when proof that no reason exsists for doing so.

As the law stands once the child is taken from the parents and given in adoption by the SS and consecuent proof that the SS were wrong in doing so, at the present there is no way of reversing or anulling the adoption in other words no contact apart from an acasional letter till the child reaches 18.

This is  not only a breach of the Human rights of the parents and grandparents but also the human rights of the child

I hearby I am petitioning for a change in the adoption law to be able to be revoked, to give grandparents rights of contact and to stop the secrecy in the family courts, and make the social services accountable for their actions.
